body:
On 2010-09-22 11:19:36 -0700, Jia Hu said:


> You may also try "mesh" -"mesh repair tools"-"rebuild mesh normals "
>  


Good idea.  I've been using the automatic meshing of Rhino export, 
which I expect to produce correct models, but if I manually meshed the 
model, that might help--maybe I'll try it.




Randolph
